fields.name: ETRSEL
fields.description: ETR source selection These bits select the ETR input source.
values: ETR input is connected to I/O

fields.name: Reserved
fields.description: must be kept at reset value.

fields.name: TI4SEL
fields.description: TI4[0] to TI4[15] input selection These bits select the TI4[0] to TI4[15] input source.

fields.name: TI2SEL
fields.description: TI2[0] to TI2[15] input selection These bits select the TI2[0] to TI2[15] input source.

fields.name: TI1SEL
fields.description: TI1[0] to TI1[15] input selection These bits select the TI1[0] to TI1[15] input source.

fields.name: Reserved
fields.description: must be kept at reset value.
